title: Phone number details with relation to an external connection

number_id.description: Phone number ID from the Telnyx API.

civic_address_id.description: Identifies the civic address assigned to the phone number.

location_id.description: Identifies the location assigned to the phone number.

displayed_country_code.description: The iso country code that will be displayed to the user when they receive a call from this phone number.

items.description: The capabilities that are available for this phone number on Microsoft Teams.
